tips:
• Qualify for reduced fare and each Metro trip would only cost $1.

  • With reduced fare capping you never pay more than $3 a day or $8 a week. Every ride after would be FREE.

  • With regular fare capping you never pay more than $6 a day or $20 a week.

• With fare capping you never pay more than $6 a day or $20 a week.

  • Qualify for reduced fare and each Metro trip would only cost $1.

  • With reduced fare capping you never pay more than $3 a day or $8 a week.

• With reduced fare capping you never pay more than $3 a day. Once you hit the cap, additional rides on Metro are FREE that day.

  • With reduced fare capping you never pay more than $8 a week. Once you hit the weekly cap, all rides on Metro are FREE.
